function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Variations in sample preparation and testing leading to differences in the effectiveness of the coating.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to resolve the effects of the polyurethane-only coating, demonstrating the necessity of cu 2 o in the film.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for incomplete inactivation of the virus due to variability in wettability of the cu 2 o/pu film","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Discrepancies in reported biocidal mechanisms of cu 2 o compounds for viral inactivation","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Uncertain virucidal activity against specific viruses, such as sars-cov-2","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Exposure to sars-cov-2 virus during testing of the cu 2 o/pu film","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inactivation of sars-cov-2 virus on the coated surface","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Storage of coated samples under water for 13 days","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Cu 2 o/pu film can be removed by heavy deliberate scratching","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cationic polymer coatings did not speed inactivation of sars-cov-2","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential release of sars-cov-2 virus from uncoated samples in the built environment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential failure of other coating technologies amine and ammonium-based polymers to inactivate the virus","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of mechanical damage to the coating leading to loss of virus-inactivating properties","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Research involving viral titers may pose a risk of accidental exposure and transmission of the virus.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of affordable housing and economic hardship leading to eviction and housing displacement","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disproportionate economic hardship and impacts of the virus on low-income and minority communities","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Association between housing displacement and increased covid-19 infection and mortality rates","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Eviction leading to overcrowding and homelessness","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transiency and overcrowding facilitate covid-19 transmission","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Evictions and housing displacement leading to increased crowding in residential environments","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Residential crowding and increased contact driving the spread of infectious respiratory illnesses","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overcrowding increasing the spread of respiratory infectious diseases in homeless shelters and public facilities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk of covid-19 transmission in transient housing","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Weakened immune system due to stress from eviction threat","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lower access to covid-19 testing post-eviction","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Eviction leading to lower access to covid-19 testing and medical attention","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decreased access to primary and specialty medical care due to eviction","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Eviction amplifying the individual risk of covid-19 complications and mortality","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor ventilation, pest infestations, and mold linked to respiratory conditions and poor health","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Eviction and housing instability associated with comorbidities and mental health conditions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High healthcare costs associated with eviction increasing the likelihood of future evictions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Traumatizing effect of eviction on children","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Health risks associated with eviction","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Racial disparities in eviction risk during covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Higher eviction rates for black and non-white households","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Racial wealth gap and lack of emergency funds","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Disproportionate impact of covid-19 on people of color","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unequal death rates for different racial and ethnic groups due to covid-19 disparities","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to social distance in low-wage jobs and crowded living conditions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Repetitive exposure to racism leading to health deterioration and chronic conditions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Eviction filings spreading covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Property owners using eviction as rent collection tool","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Evictions for small amounts of money","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of legal protections and support for tenants","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased covid-19 transmission due to lifting eviction moratoria","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Excess infections due to backlog of cases and economic duress","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of access to legal representation in eviction cases","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of health care access and medical debt","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased housing precarity among low-income populations and people of color","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Eviction and housing displacement increases the spread of covid-19 among vulnerable populations","category":"Society","confidence":"High"}]}
